title: Amazon mastered the internet. Grocery stores are a different story.
description: Amazon’s grocery business is facing lawsuits over grocery stores it failed to open. This week it laid off hundreds of employees.

title: How to reduce the risk of battery fires from EVs and on planes
description: How much should you worry about battery fires from electric vehicles, or gadget fires on airplanes?

title: Child-care worker charged with abusing 91 girls over 15 years
description: Police in Australia charged the unnamed man with 1,600 child abuse offenses, including rape, after "Operation Tenterfield," a federal investigation.

title: Twitter, now X, sues group that researched hate speech on platform
description: Elon Musk's X alleged the Center for Countering Digital Hate violated its terms of service in a bid to scare away advertisers and harm the company financially.
